tp:nomenclature.tp:taxon-name: Anamastigona radmani Makarov, Rađa, Rađa, Tomić, Mitić & Ćurcić, 2007

tp:treatment-sec.p: Maquis, near a spring (Makarov pers. com.). Some specimens were found submerged.
